Help.brief: Returns the usage of a command.

Echo.brief: The bot says what you want it to.

SetPrefix.brief: Sets the prefix of the bot.

Enable.brief: Enables a command or module for use.

Disable.brief: Disables a command or module from being used.

Wallet.brief: Shows info relating to the user's currency data.
Wallet.additional: If no argument is provided, it shows the wallet of the user who queried.

Daily.brief: Collects the user's extra credits for the day.
Daily.additional: The daily reward resets every 24 hours. Make sure to collect it every time!

Donate.brief: Gives the specified user currency from your wallet.

Steal.brief: Chance to steal an amount from a user, otherwise it will fine you.
Steal.additional: The more you try to steal, the less likely it will be to succeed.

Compensate.brief: Adds some amount to everyone's (or a specified user's) balance.
Compensate.additional: Negative values will take money away.

Richlist.brief: Displays a list of the richest people on the server.
Richlist.additional: Providing a single argument will treat it as the max.

Gamble.brief: Play a game of chance with this command.
Gamble.additional: If no bet is provided by the user, one will be provided by default.
